snippet: The company that has long sold the sporty Miata roadster builds some of that dynamic into the CX-5, showing that running errands can be fun.
abstract: Driven column review of the 2016 Mazda CX-5.
lead_paragraph: The company that has long sold the sporty Miata roadster builds some of that dynamic into the CX-5, showing that running errands can be fun.

headline.print_headline: Mazda Offers a Bit of Sportiness With the CX-5 Crossover
headline.main: Video Review: Mazda Offers a Bit of Sportiness With the CX-5 Crossover
